simplified: 在家靠父母，出外靠朋友

pronunciation.pinyin: zài jiā kào fù mǔ , chū wài kào péng you
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: zai4 jia1 kao4 fu4 mu3 , chu1 wai4 kao4 peng2 you5

details.simplified: 在家靠父母，出外靠朋友
details.traditional: 在家靠父母，出外靠朋友

meanings.value: one depends on one's parents when at home, and on one's friends when away from home
